hierophant:DonationBoxRelic.NAME: Donation Box
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each combat, earn enough gold to reach a total of #b80.

hierophant:PropheticMaskRelic.NAME: Prophetic Mask
DESCRIPTIONS: Retain the highest cost card of your hand (Chosen at random when tied).

hierophant:BeggarsRobeRelic.NAME: Beggar's Robe
DESCRIPTIONS: When you have less than 10 gold, gain +4 Strength and +4 Dexterity.
